zh.name: AWS 云渗透测试
zh.desc: 发现并利用亚马逊云环境中的配置风险和权限漏洞。
zh.full_desc: 学习如何在 AWS 环境中进行安全评估。涵盖 IAM 权限滥用、S3 存储桶泄露、EC2 元数据利用（SSRF）等实战技术，教你识别云原生的攻击面并保护云基础设施的安全性。

en.name: AWS Penetration Testing
en.desc: Discover and exploit misconfigurations and permission flaws in AWS cloud environments.
en.full_desc: Learn to conduct security assessments in AWS. Covers IAM privilege escalation, S3 bucket enumeration, and EC2 metadata (SSRF) exploitation, helping you identify and secure cloud-native attack surfaces.
